column4: hey... i was wondering if anyone has noticed that you can't open more than one terminal in the latest version of ubuntu netbook remix.... anyone know why?
hmm i didn't know that ... you should be able to do a Ctrl+Shift+T to get a second terminal tab
have you tried Ctrl+Alt-F1, Ctrl+alt+f2 etc ... these are virtual terminals Ctrl+alt+F7 should bring you back to norm
